channel.title: Question about the server status page
channel.description:
Okay. Verifying my server after I have posted it. It gives me these credentials. Where do I enter these credentials.. So I log into my server with them?
Thanks.

item.title: Question about the server status page
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

Ask the owner

Read full topic
item.source: Question about the server status page

item.title: Question about the server status page
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

If your server doesn’t require external activation you’re fine. So that means if it automatically registers you when you login you don’t need to login beforehand. The verification server will log in to the server at some point to verify it’s a real server (not sure when, though).

Read full topic
item.source: Question about the server status page

item.title: Question about the server status page
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

u mean u get an username and a password?

yust open ur client write the username and password it says log in log out, and few mins -hours ur server wil be on the status page , i had the same problem

Read full topic
